name: Pixiponia
description:
Pixiponia is a low pixel 2D sandbox game. In this game, I will gradually add new content. 

At the beginning, the content of the game is very limited, but it will grow over time. You are welcome to leave a comment here or participate in the discussion board.

This is a list of planned features

  • Random world generation
  • Day-night cycle
  • Farming
  • Crafting
  • Survival mechanics (hunger, thirst, etc.)
  • Weather and seasons
  • A lively world with NPCs and Wildlife
  • and many more
